title: Handle a Vehicle Accident Report
description: A driver reports they have been in an accident during a trip. A safety agent must manage the initial response.

tasks.description: Receive a high-priority call from a driver reporting an accident.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent opens a critical incident case.

tasks.description: Confirm if the driver, rider, and any third parties are safe and if emergency services have been called.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms emergency services are on the scene.

tasks.description: Temporarily deactivate the driver's account pending investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver's account is put on hold.

tasks.description: Provide the driver and rider with insurance information and assign the case to the insurance claims team.
tasks.expected_outcome: The case is escalated to the claims team for handling.
